I love this game, but I'm going to give it a 9/10 until valve buffs the R8.
This is a fun, action packed FPS. Recommended to practice and play a bit before heading into competitive

The game is fun, and is hard to learn. It isn't just a pick up and play game really. The skins create a great economy and lots of fun for the community.

But uh.. well...
-toxic community
-hackers
-smurfs
-scammers
-etc

If you can deal with the things listed above, you'll love it ;)
感觉很好，虽然有时候特别玄学什么隔一墙一人穿我爆头之类的，游戏挺不错的，没皮肤也不影响什么而且皮肤也不贵
这里一款朋友向我推荐的游戏，在我看来这是一款技术性游戏，里面丰富多彩，各种地图使我挑战性越来越强
